summary: This is a financial memorandum from Darren K Indyke to Amanda Kirby regarding a wire transfer of 13,700,000 Russian Rubles from Jeffrey E. Epstein's account to a beneficiary bank in Moscow, Russia. The document is marked confidential and is part of the Epstein case records.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: The memorandum is regarding a wire transfer from his account.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: The memorandum is addressed to her regarding a wire transfer.

persons.name: Darren K Indyke
persons.context: He authored the memorandum instructing the wire transfer.

persons.name: Bella Klein
persons.context: She is listed as the contact for any questions regarding the wire transfer.

connections.description: Darren K Indyke is authorizing a wire transfer from Jeffrey E. Epstein's account.
Darren K Indyke is sending a memorandum to Amanda Kirby regarding a financial transaction.
Bella Klein is listed as the contact for questions regarding the wire transfer authorized by Darren K Indyke.

events.title: Wire transfer authorization
events.description: A wire transfer of 13,700,000 Russian Rubles from Jeffrey E. Epstein's account to AO Raiffeisenbank in Moscow, Russia was authorized.

keyFacts: A wire transfer of 13,700,000 Russian Rubles was authorized from Jeffrey E. Epstein's account on March 27, 2015.
The transfer was directed to AO Raiffeisenbank in Moscow, Russia, indicating international financial activity.
The document is marked as confidential and is part of the Epstein case records (DB-SDNY-0050560).
Darren K Indyke and Amanda Kirby are involved in the financial transaction process for Epstein.
The document references Standard Chartered Bank in New York as the intermediary bank.
